txt.en: These enormous tusks are evidence of the existence of a boar of legendary size.\n\nSaeradan may be interested in seeing them.

'You took these from a great boar, you say? Indeed, this beast must have rivalled the Boar of Everholt, slain in ages past by Folca, king of Rohan.

'That great beast terrorized the road through the Firienfeld for a long time, until at last King Folca, famed hunter that he was, took it upon himself to rid Rohan of the Boar. Alas, his victory was also his death, for the tusk-wounds he received were mortal.

'It would not surprise me to learn that this sow was in fact a distant descendant of that monster... what power created such a creature, I cannot say.'
You harvested the enormous tusks of the Black Sow, which remain in pristine condition.
Bring the tusks of the Black Sow to Saeradan at Echad Saeradan
Saeradan is at Echad Saeradan in the Windfells of Enedwaith.\n\nYou should bring the tusks of the Black Sow to Saeradan for his examination.
